snippet: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for interesting items on the Web. On Tuesday, they found items on acting robots, rock stars who like tech companies and what could possibly be a new classic cartoon on tech from...
abstract: The tech reporters and editors of The New York Times are always looking for interesting items on the Web. On Tuesday, they found items on acting robots, rock stars who like tech companies and what could possibly be a new classic cartoon on tech from The New Yorker,
lead_paragraph: Here's what the tech reporters and editors found on the Web. For more items, go to the full list in the right-hand column.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Emoting Robots and the Stalin of Facebook
